name: Explore Sajek-Valley
duration: Two Nights, One day stay in a luxurious resort in the lap of the hills
detail: Sajek Valley is one of the most desired place to visit. Its the place is sorrounded by natural hills which can relax and entertain you. You can come here with us to make your vacation memorable. We will start our journey at 6 am. from dhaka by a luxirous ac bus. Reaching Khagrachori we will have breakfast and then a thrilling ride through hills by chander gari to sajek valley will reach you to the long cherised destination. After arrinving to the sajek valley we will check in to our resort and will have our lunch. In the evening we will move arround to kangalkpara, ruilui para and the halipad. we will have barbeque party at night and fire at the top of the hills.
